ModMetaData.name: Halflings of the Moot
ModMetaData.author: Xazil
ModMetaData.description:
V1.1.0 24-Aug-21
Adds Warhammer style Halflings to RimWorld.
Small humanoids that are fond of food and usually good with a bow. Their small frames requires their own clothes which are focused towards a Warhammer Fantasy level of technology.
The Moot is a province of the Empire known for its farmlands and quality of produce.
Includes: - Playable Halfling race - Starter Halfling scenario - The Moot as a faction - Halfling apparel
Requires: Harmony Jec's Tools (Unofficial) HugsLib Humanoid Alien Races Rimhammer - The End Times [Optional]
Thanks to:
SickBoyWI for Rimhammer inspiration and which this is meant to expand.
Jecrell for Lord of the Rims - Hobbits and his tools and tutorials.
Games Workshop for a great setting.
J.R.R. Tolkien for Lord of the Rings which set all this in motion.
==== Change Log 1.0.0 ==== Initial release
==== Change Log 1.0.1 ==== Bug fixes
==== Change Log 1.0.2 ==== Compatibility with Rimhammer magic items and jewelry added with thanks from SickBoyWI
==== Change Log 1.1.0 ==== Added support for 1.3 and minor typos
